metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4379 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A use-after-free vulnerability was found in __nfs42_ssc_open() in fs/nfs/nfs4file.c in the Linux kernel. This flaw allows an attacker to conduct a remote denial It was discovered that the NFSD implementation in the Linux kernel contained a use-after-free vulnerability. A remote attacker could possibly use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-4379` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-37-generic - 6.1.0-14.14
linux-image-6.2.0-37-generic-lpae - 6.1.0-14.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-37-generic - 6.1.0-14.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-37-generic-64k - 6.1.0-14.14
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-37-generic - 6.1.0-14.14
linux-image-6.2.0-37-generic-lpae - 6.1.0-14.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-37-generic - 6.1.0-14.14
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-37-generic-64k - 6.1.0-14.14
No subscription required

notes.Note: cascardo> prioritizing as Medium as nfsd parameter inter_copy_offload_enable is off by default.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.1.0-14.14').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needed').
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-oracle package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-raspi package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-signed package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.1.0-14.14').
linux-signed-aws package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-signed-azure package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-signed-gcp package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-signed-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needed').
linux-signed-kvm package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-signed-lowlatency package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-signed-oracle package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
